categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope actors

nodes.text: Sadie Eden, sometimes credited as Sadie Eddon, was a regular stunt woman on the James Bond films before her role in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. She played Garindan and Reegesk. On the day of shooting, none of the regular background artists wanted to wear the Ranat suit, so Edon braved the extremely hot costume.
She is credited by John Mollo as portraying a "rodent" in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope as documented in the 1979 book The Art of Star Wars.
